VolumeContext: Context that populates a list of Actors derived from AVolume to test against
VolumeClass: If VolumeContext is null, AVolume Class will be used to populate a list of AVolume to test against
bDoComplexVolumeTest: If bDoComplexVolumeTest is set, it will use a full volume physic test (not only a bounding box test)
bSkipTestIfNoVolumes: If no volumes are returned to evaluate the points against then just ignore the test rather than failing each item
